title: Create a business

title: Get businesses collection
name: FetchAllByPagination

Success 200.description: name of the representative of the business

title: Get users collection

description: Get a collection of users.

title: Get users collection
name: FetchPaginated
description: Get a collection of users. The endpoint has pagination out of the box. Use these params to query with pagination: page=<RESULTS_PAGE and per_page=<RESULTS_PER_PAGE>.

title: Get User
name: Get
description: Get a user with the given id

title: Login a user
name: Login
description: Log in a user. The request returns a token used to authentication of the user on subsequent requests. The token is placed as an HTTP header ie Authorization: Bearer <Token-here> otherwise requests are rejected.

title: Logout a user
name: Logout
description: Invalidate a users token

title: Create a user
name: Signup
description: Create a new user

title: Update User
name: Update
description: Update a user with the given id

title: Update user password/pin
name: UpdatePassword
description: Update password of a given user.
